prompt: Is there an AI that translates audio?

hidden_queries: AI that translates audio in real time or from recordings
tools that take spoken language audio and output translated audio or text
metadata.generated_search_query: AI that translates audio in real time or from recordings

citation_mappings.claim_text: Yes — there are several AI tools that can translate audio (spoken language) into another language, either as text or spoken output. Real-time & Live Translation Some AI systems translate spoken conversation live as you speak or during meetings (voice-to-voice or voice-to-text). Maestra+1
Dedicated services (like Wordly) target meetings and events with live captioning and translated audio streams. Wordly

sources.title: These $140 earbuds translate 50+ languages while you listen
sources.snippet: The Mymanu Orb Open-Ear AI Translation Earbuds, showcased at CES 2026, offer users a unique blend of audio entertainment, real-world awareness, and advanced language translation technology. Priced at $139.99 (down from a $179.99 MSRP), these earbuds feature an open-ear design that allows users to hear their surroundings while simultaneously listening to music, taking calls, or translating real-time conversations. The standout feature is their built-in AI, which supports translation in over 50 languages across live conversations, phone calls, and spoken audio—ideal for travel, work, or multilingual environments. Beyond translation, the earbuds function as typical audio accessories with a sleek, lightweight, and water-resistant design. With up to 35 hours of battery life using the charging case and hands-free controls, they offer a user-friendly and futuristic audio solution without added complexity.

citation_mappings.claim_text: New hardware (e.g., AI translation earbuds) can translate conversations in real time as you listen. SFGATE

File-based or Uploaded Audio Translation Web tools let you upload an audio file (MP3, WAV, etc.) and get the translated speech or transcript back. Examples include: Maestra – voice translator and subtitle generator. Maestra AI
VMEG – supports real-time voice translation for 170+ languages and accents. VMEG AI

sources.title: Listen and Translate - AI Audio Translator - VEED.IO
sources.snippet: Translate audio and video to 100+ languages with our AI translator. Upload a file, translate in one click, and create subtitles with our integrated video editor.

citation_mappings.claim_text: VEED and Rask – audio/video translation with text and subtitles. VEED.IO+1
Free online voice translators (e.g., Notegpt, Aspose) that output natural-sounding speech. NoteGPT+1

How They Work (Common Pattern) Speech-to-text: AI turns the audio into text. Machine translation: The text gets translated to the target language. Text-to-speech (optional): AI generates spoken audio in the new language. heygen.com

sources.title: Pixel 10's AI-powered voice translate feature launches first in the Netherlands, offering real-time, on-device call translation while Germany waits
sources.snippet:
Google has started rolling out its new AI-powered Voice Translate feature for Pixel 10 users, with the Netherlands being the first country to receive it. This real-time voice translation capability, powered by the Tensor G5 chip, enables seamless two-way communication during phone calls by translating speech into the recipient’s language and reproducing it in the caller’s voice. The feature works entirely on-device, which ensures speed, security, and privacy by removing the need for cloud processing or internet access.

Users can activate Voice Translate by selecting their preferred languages, downloading relevant language packs, and tapping the "Call Assist" button during calls. Although the feature lists German among its supported languages, Pixel 10 users in Germany have reported that it has not yet appeared for them, likely due to a phased rollout strategy by Google. The supported languages include German, French, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and Swedish. The launch highlights Google's continued push to integrate advanced AI capabilities into its devices while addressing privacy and regulatory concerns.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Built-in Device Features Some platforms or devices (like certain phones or conferencing tools) now include on-device or in-app translation of spoken audio in real time. androidcentral.com+1
